column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?
#Text=The first order of business should be to recognise the intrinsic value of the family and seek to withdraw all programs which interfere in the health of the family .
#Text=This would include : eliminate funding for abortion which has contributed to our nationwide crisis due to the loss of ' replacement birthrate ' .

#Text=This problem will still compound for many years but it would be a first step towards resolving the issue ; it would also include a voucher system for education to ensure that parents are in control of how their children are educated ; The FCP would also seek to remove social assistance to youth under 18 who have parents able to support them .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?
#Text=Because of the vast infrastructure which must be maintained using a limited income source , I believe that property taxes are above what they should be .
#Text=Municipalities are closer to the people thus they should be able to provide the services using some of the tax strategies of federal and provincial governments .
#Text=Property taxes are paid only by homeowners , there are many people who do not own homes but using the services .
#Text=We need a system of taxing fairly all users of our infrastructure .
#Text=How can the province lead the way in stimulating job creation ?
#Text=The province can lead the way by encouraging the growth of small business .
#Text=Enabling people to become self-employed stimulates the economy with new jobs .
#Text=By taking the pressure off municipalities to offer incentives for large companies to move from municipality to municipality , depending on where they get the best tax break .
#Text=What are your views on the mixed member proportional representation ( MMP ) referendum ?
#Text=I believe it will better represent the diverse opinions which are part of this province .
#Text=Under the present FPTP system the majority of opinions are not represented in the Legislature because they have been effectively silenced by false majority governments .
#Text=We need to allow representation to all members and viewpoints in Ontario .
#Text=What role , if any , does " new media " play in your campaign , and the campaign of your party ?
#Text=( websites , blogs , Facebook , YouTube videos , etc )
#Text=Do you view it as beneficial , or a challenge ?
#Text=My campaign is largely based in ' new media ' .
#Text=I live 3-4 hours from the riding for which I am the candidate .
#Text=This means that I must use the opportunities provided by websites , emails etc.
#Text=Of the decisions made by Ontario 's 38th Legislative Assembly , which was the most beneficial to your this electoral district ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
#Text=Which was least beneficial , or even harmful , to your this riding ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
